body:
Hello,
In our recent Map development meeting have we been discussing a lot of things. And one the things we'd like to introduce is something we call "The community removal". We're doing this to get the community's feedback on maps, if they would like to keep the maps or not.
  This thread will be rebooted every week with 4 new maps!

--------
Last week's results are following:
Fantasy: Remove
Planks: This was removed by Blazikenite because he had people in-game complaining about the map really hard. Please contact a Map developer if you have an issue with this, and don't go crazy on us.
Port town 2: Keep, we might do some slight changes to the monument placement, but do not expect anything.
--------

So, how does this little thing work?

Every week on this thread you will see 4 maps. These maps are being discussed if we should keep or not. Under me you will right now see four different maps. We, Map Developers would like you to share your thought of this map. Do you want this map to stay, or get removed? When you give ur opinion on the map, please do motivate why you think like you do. Maybe we wont have to remove the map and instead make a certain change to it instead! And remember to always put the tag "keep, edit or remove", otherwise we Map developers may not understand ur point and we get confused if you want to keep it or not.

The following 4 maps that will either be removed/stay:

Dust devils


We chose to discuss this map because in our eyes it's too big to provide a good aspect of gameplay.
We also chose this map because the monuments were poorly placed and becomes an extreme stalemate if a defense is set up.

-------
Honeycomb

In our eyes the diamond makes the map very unfair.
We also think that it's very hard to get to the gold blocks on ur own island.

-------
Halcyon


In our eyes the map is way too small, maybe remake it to a competetive version?
We also think that the monument islands are poorly placed and becomes an extreme stalemate.

--------
Teres


In our eyes the map gets rushed way too easy and usually ends in the first 5 minutes.
We also think that the map is too big to provide good gameplay, and people usually end up rushing.

--------

This is when you can make a change, please motivate why you think like you do. Hopefully this will improve and create a better avicus experience.

I'd also like to say that the system will be added for this week, I'm sorry I did not implement it in the last week.

Thank you!

title: The community removal | #2

replies.body:
Dust Devils - Keep. However, you can do some slight changes by moving the monument away from the spawn, as the spawn is way too close to the monument. 

Honeycomb  - Keep, however, remove the diamonds. 

Halcyon - Remake it and make it bigger and less stalematey. 

Teres - Maybe make it smaller so that it isn't too big
replies.body_tagged:
Dust Devils - Keep. However, you can do some slight changes by moving the monument away from the spawn, as the spawn is way too close to the monument. 

Honeycomb  - Keep, however, remove the diamonds. 

Halcyon - Remake it and make it bigger and less stalematey. 

Teres - Maybe make it smaller so that it isn't too big

replies.body:
Dust devils:
Change the monument placement. Too close to spawn, really hard to get. Anyways good gameplay. Keep.

Honeycomb:
Keep, good gameplay, people actually defends on this map, too many diamonds. 

Halcyon:
Keep, good gameplay, not too easy to get the monuments, not too hard. 

Teres:
Remove or change, too easily rushed, too big, bad gameplay.

Halcyon:

Teres:
Remove or change, too easily rushed, too big, bad gameplay.

Dust Devils - Really good old map I love it. However monument is a bit tricky to get might wanna move it up some other place

Halcyon - Old, classic really fun map because it's the smallest map it can get stalematey some time but keep it

Teres - Remove, it's too big 3 monuments as well, 2 of them are practically next to each other and the other one is on top of the castle. Also, you only spawn with 16 logs and 32 cobble so it's not that great.

Teres- Oh the nostalgia , as much as i would hate to see it go i would have to agree with everyone else.The gameplay is awful ,  everyone's running around in diamond and flame bows , that's not what nebulas about.

replies.body:
Im just going to give you all a heads up that it is going to be really hard to make a map like teres small without it looking weird. 
  Basically,  if you want the map edited to make it smaller,  we will simply take that as a remove, as we have other more important things to work on to improve the rotations.
replies.body_tagged:
Im just going to give you all a heads up that it is going to be really hard to make a map like teres small without it looking weird. 
  Basically,  if you want the map edited to make it smaller,  we will simply take that as a remove, as we have other more important things to work on to improve the rotations.

replies.body:
You can't make a map smaller xd

If avicus had a larger player base and the map was like a 40 vs 40, then it would work. But with such a small and declining player base (HINT KYLO HINT) you can't have big maps. But Dust devils works due to the structures

Honeycomb - Absolutely love this map. It is a great map but remove diamonds. People at diamond defense get annoying!

Halcyon - Either Remove or change it a lot. This map is way too small with no peh veh peh space also please add more iron and remove the diamonds or leave the ones in the middle.

Teres - Keep this map. It is a great stalemate map and it really challenges me sometimes. Absolutely love this map!

replies.body:
Editing Halcyon and Teres would be really weird.. 
Dust Devils: I actually don't mind the stalemate, the gameplay is usually good. Either delay the spawning or move the mon back, away from spawn. Keep
Honeycomb: Gameplay is just bad, I always avoid it. Remove.
Halcyon: I like this map, though islands could be bigger to prevent kb abuse. But like I mentioned earlier, it would make the map look really weird. Keep.
Teres: Huge map, Mons are easy to get, stalemates are rare, but can happen. It's the mon placement that's a problem. Remove/Edit
